Document:
# Felinid
Felinids are a mutation of humans, sporting their signature ears and tail from your favourite japanese cartoons.
## Diet
Felinids share evolutionary roots with cats, and so they cannot metabolize Theobromine or Allicin. Be careful when eating chocolate, onions, or garlic, and avoid coffee and tea! Despite their dietary restrictions, they get thirsty 20% faster than other species.
## Claws
Felinids have razor sharp claws, so their unarmed attacks deal [color=#ec3a3a]Slashing[/color] and [color=#ec3a3a]Piercing[/color] damage.
## Keen Senses
Felinids take less damage from falling and impacts than other species thanks to their evolutionary roots!
## Padded Feet
Felinids can creep around silently when they're not wearing shoes, but are prone to being stunned quicker and have 25% less stamina than other species.
## Damage
Felinids take 15% more [color=#ec3a3a]Blunt[/color], [color=#ec3a3a]Slashing[/color] and [color=#ec3a3a]Piercing[/color] damage, and take 30% more [color=#ec3a3a]Cold[/color] damage than other species.
